PERSONA:

As the primary householder of a married-couple household with kids, he is married to his 27-year-old wife, who works part-time. His annual income is approximately $52,000, which, combined with his wife's part-time income as a dental hygienist ($30,000 per year), provides a household income of $82,000.

This individual's economic concerns include saving for his children's education, paying off their mortgage, and ensuring job security in the automotive sector, which he perceives as being vulnerable to economic downturns and technological changes. His political views are likely influenced by his desire for economic stability, support for local businesses, and access to quality public education for his children.
